#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
     int t;
     cin>>t;
     while(t--)
     {
         int n;
         long long sum=0;
         scanf("%d",&n);
         for(int i=1;i<n-1;i++)
         if(i%2)
         sum+=i;
         printf("%lld\n",sum);
     }
     
    return 0;
}
